## HDFS Shell
HDFSHDFSshell

HDFSHDFS
- hadoop fs  HDFS
- hadoop dfs HDFSDeprecated()hdfs dfs
- hdfs dfs HDFS

Linuxshellls()
``` bash
hdfs dfs -ls / #hdfs dfs 
```
> - -ls

>  /     (HDFS)


``` bash
hdfs dfs -ls / #ls 

hdfs dfs mkdir p /user/hadoop #mkdir  -p 

hdfs dfs rm r /input #rm  -r 

hdfs dfs -cp /myLocalFile.txt /user/hadoop/ #cp HDFS myLocalFile.txt/user/hadoop/

hdfs dfs cat /myLocalFile.txt # cat  

hdfs dfs -put /home/hadoop/myLocalFile.txt  / #put HDFS myLocalFile.txtHDFS
hdfs dfs -put /home/hadoop/myLocalFile.txt  /test.txt #myLocalFile.txtHDFS,test.txt

hdfs dfs -get /myLocalFile.txt  /home/hadoop/ # get  HDFSmyLocalFile.txt/home/hadoop/
```

Post.title: CentOS7
Post._content:
## root

1. IP
vivi [Vi ](https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000008929397)
```
vi /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-ens33
```
ifcfg-ens33
```
# 
BOOTPROTO=static         # IP
ONBOOT=yes           # 

# (ip)
IPADDR=192.168.43.137# IP
NETMASK=255.255.255.0   # 
GATEWAY=192.168.43.1    # 
```


```
# Xshell
systemctl restart network
```

2. 

```
# wgetLinux
yum install -y wget
       
# Aliyunrepo
wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-7.repo

# 
yum clean all
yum makecache
```

3. VimVi

```
yum install -y vim 
```

4. 

```
# 
systemctl stop firewalld

# 
systemctl disable firewalld
```
5. CentOS

```
yum update && yum upgrade
```
6. sudo
sudo xxx  sudoers  (xxx is not in the sudoers file)
```
# root
visudo
```
100root
```
# hadoop
hadoop  ALL=(ALL)       ALL
```

![visudo](centos7-initial-configuration/01.png)

[Centos7.7](https://juejin.im/post/6844904101583519752)

Post.title: Git
Post._content:
## 
[Git ](https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/896043488029600)
Git[Pro Git](https://git-scm.com/book/zh/v2)Git
Linux [ Git](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1HW411f7VJ)
## 
Git 2.23 (2019.8.16) 
git checkout git switch  git restore
devgit checkout -b dev git switch -c dev 

## 
Git Bash
1. 
```bash
#  Git Bash Here
# ""
git config --global user.name "username"
git config --global user.email "email"

# 
git config user.name
git config user.email
```
2. SSH 
```bash
# ssh-keygen
# -t 
# -Cssh-keygen -t rsa
ssh-keygen -t rsa -C ""

# 3

# .sshid_rsa.pub GitHub Settings-SSH and GPG keys-SSH keys

# Github 
ssh git@github.com
# Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? 
# yes

#
# Hi aaronlinv! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.
# Connection to github.com closed.
```

## 0Git
```bash 
# Git
mkdir learn-git
cd learn-git
git init

# 
vim test.txt

#  test.txtUntracked
git status

# 
git add test.txt

# commit -m 
git commit -m "add test.txt"

# GitHubGitHub
# 
git remote add origin git@github.com:aaronlinv/learn-git.git

#  fetchpush
git remote -v 

# SSHSSH
git push -u origin master
# -ugit push
# originorigin
# master
```
push refusing to merge unrelated histories
commit
```bash
git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories
```

## 1
```bash
# HTTPSSSH
git clone https://github.com/aaronlinv/learn-git.git

# Git
cd learn-git

# 
git pull


```
## 2
```bash
# 
# commit
git pull

# devgit branch -b dev
git switch -c dev

# 
git branch

# dev addcommit

# dev
git push origin dev
#  :f1
git push origin dev:f1

# dev
git push origin :dev 

# devmaster(mastermerge)
git switch master
git merge --no-ff dev 

# 
git log --graph --pretty=oneline --abbrev-commit

# dev
git branch -d dev 
```

## mergerebase
#### 

```sql
-- 
```

```sql
delimiter $$
```
```sql
-- returns
create function rand_str(n int) returns varchar(255)
begin 

-- str 52
declare str varchar(100) default 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ';

-- 
declare i int default 0;

declare res_str varchar(255) default '';

while i < n do
-- 1-52 floor(1+RAND()*52)  floor()
-- substr(str,floor(1+RAND()*52),1); -- 
set res_str = concat(res_str,substr(str,floor(1+RAND()*52),1));

set i = i + 1;
end while;

return res_str;

end $$
delimiter ;

-- 
select rand_str(4);
```

#### 

```sql
-- create table emp (id int,name varchar(50),age int);
-- 
delimiter $$
create procedure insert_emp(in startNum int,in max_num int)
begin

declare i int default 0;
-- sqlsql
set autocommit = 0;

repeat
set i = i + 1;

insert into emp values (startNum+i,rand_str(5),floor(10+rand()*30));

until i = max_num
end repeat;

commit; -- sql 
end$$
delimiter ;

-- 
call insert_emp(100,10000000);
```

``` python
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
```
``` python
import bs4


def getHTMLText(url):
    try:
        r = requests.get(url, timeout=30)
        r.raise_for_status()
        r.encoding = r.apparent_encoding
        return r.text
    except:
        return ""


def fillUnivList(ulist, html):
    soup = BeautifulSoup(html, 'html.parser')
    for tr in soup.find('tbody').children:
        if isinstance(tr, bs4.element.Tag):
            # import bs4 
            tds = tr('td')  # tr td
            ulist.append([tds[0].string, tds[1].string, tds[2].string])


# def printUnivList(ulist, num):
#     print("{:^10}\t{:^6}\t{:^10}".format("", "", ""))

#     for i in range(num):
#         u = ulist[i]
#         print("{:^10}\t{:^6}\t{:^10}".format(u[0], u[1], u[2]))


def printUnivList(ulist, num):
    tplt = "{0:^10}\t{1:{3}^10}\t{2:^10}"
    print(tplt.format("", "", "", chr(12288)))
    # 

    for i in range(num):
        u = ulist[i]
        # print(u)
        print(tplt.format(u[0], u[1], u[2], chr(12288)))


def main():
    uinfo = []
    url = 'http://zuihaodaxue.com/zuihaodaxuepaiming2019.html'
    html = getHTMLText(url)
    fillUnivList(uinfo, html)
    printUnivList(uinfo, 20) 


main()
```

```java
package com.itlike.web.filter;

public class FirstFilter implements Filter {
    @Override
    public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {

    }

    // 
    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest servletRequest, ServletResponse servletResponse, FilterChain filterChain) throws IOException, ServletException {
        System.out.println("this is Filter ");
        // 
        filterChain.doFilter(servletRequest,servletResponse);
    }

    @Override
    public void destroy() {
    }
}
```

```java
package com.itlike.web;

@WebServlet("/MyServlet")
public class MyServlet extends HttpServlet {
    @Override
    protected void service(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
        System.out.println("MyServlet");
    }
}
```

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">
    <filter>
        <filter-name>myfliter</filter-name>
        <filter-class>com.itlike.web.filter.FirstFilter</filter-class>
    </filter>

    <filter-mapping>
        <filter-name>myfliter</filter-name>
    <!-- MySerlvetmyfliter-->
        <url-pattern>/MyServlet</url-pattern>
    </filter-mapping>
</web-app>
```
